subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy shot a seven-under-par 65 to take the first-round lead at the Dubai Desert Classic, four shots better than No. 1 Lee Westwood and Martin Kaymer and six ahead of Tiger Woods.
snippet: Rory McIlroy shot a seven-under-par 65 to take the first-round lead at the Dubai Desert Classic, four shots better than No. 1 Lee Westwood and Martin Kaymer and six ahead of Tiger Woods.
